description: Aliens are creating mutants on Earth, and it is up to Godzilla to save the planet from the giant monsters in GODZILLA THE SERIES: MONSTER WARS. You take control of the giant lizard in 10 levels of action that take place in deserts...
name: Godzilla The Series: Monster Wars

original_info.name: Godzilla: The Series: Monster Wars Trilogy
